TopicTitle: Your avatar is stuck in an elevator with the above poster's avatar, what do you do?

Articles.Content: Yes*sniffles* I know...I know! We need Steven Spielberg!

Yes*sniffles* I know...I know! We need Steven Spielberg!

Yes, excellent.

Also Morgan Freeman takes the lead role.
What does the tennisball say?

*cuddle*

(tenfahkingchar)

Forgot which avatar I have here.

I'm thinking the radiation of gravity sheer would probably do any other occupants in. Also, who found an elevator big enough to fit a neutron star?

Edited November 3, 2013 by Randox
what. Explain, Explain, EXPLAAIIIN!
Same. I have no idea what he just said.

Also, who found an elevator big enough to fit a neutron star?

That would be me. Here's my card. the Ludicrously Impractical Yet Oddly Specific Elevators Ltd.

We do a lot of work for various Bond villains.

Yes I'm reading your resume as we speak, and your work is very good.\

I would like to order a elevator for a 5 story building. Its small but yet takes enough time for a long fight and big enough to fit a secret room with 5 big men, a meth lab, room for some gun fighting and, something secret. Il just say.....its for the next bond movie.

Yes I'm reading your resume as we speak, and your work is very good.\

I would like to order a elevator for a 5 story building. Its small but yet takes enough time for a long fight and big enough to fit a secret room with 5 big men, a meth lab, room for some gun fighting and, something secret. Il just say.....its for the next bond movie.

*scribbles*

Excellent. Would you like mahogany furnishing or would something in the more sterile aluminum spectrum suit you better?
Wagh! Salesmen! I thought you only come to us at our homes!

Wagh! Salesmen! I thought you only come to us at our homes!

I know where you live, work and eat.

I know every detail about your life and will use the knowledge to my advantage so I can sell you Oddly Specific Elevators at low low prices.

oh yeah? tell me where I live, work and eat!

I live in ponyville and work as a musician, thank you very much!

oh yeah? tell me where I live, work and eat!

I live in ponyville and work as a musician, thank you very much!

If I told you that info, you could easily change it. No, no, it is much more... fun this way...
Very specific elevator... can I have a personal ISE?

Oh no.

DERPIBOORU IS DOWN! PANIIIIIIIC!!!
Yay, derpibooru is back up, and I got a new avatar!

Cool, but the old one was better

P.S. anthro Octavia? too anthro for me
I'll look for a better one, gimmie a sec, besides why does it have to be JPEG, it looked fine on Derpibooru
Ack! Why must it be JPEG? the worst type of file possible, It's just not classy! Unlike PNG over there...
